comment.author: 88428255@N07
comment._content: I think there are more trees on the Headland today then back in 1932 .. Great photo .. I notice guys loved their cars enough back in those days to cover them to protect from them hot summer sun and salt air.

comment.author: 32605636@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/88428255@N07] We placed this photo over a contemporary view in Historypin historypin.com. It is a very different picture today! You can see it here: www.historypin.com/map/#!/geo:-28.096825,153.443296/zoom:...
